passives.name: Stone Extension
passives.desc:
Stone use +2

When using Stone:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Self: 5 turns BRV Regen

While BRV at least 30% of MAX:
â€¢ Stone becomes Stone+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before  PG attack; triggers additional  PF attack after use; high turn rate)

After using Stoneã€? Stone+:
â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV; magic  PG attack; moderately increased BRV damage) for 5 turns
passives.short_desc: Stone Extension: Boost to Stone

passives.name: Buffed Initial Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises INT BRVã€? largely raises MAX BRV with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Boost: Raises INT BRVã€? MAX BRV

passives.name: Medica II Extension
passives.desc:
When using Medica II:
 â€¢ Increases BRV based on INT BRV before BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Slightly increased BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Party: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted to allies
passives.short_desc: Medica II Extension: Boost to Medica II
